subject: Le Mans Auto Race
Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Danish driver Tom Kristensen, 42, holds the record of eight victories for a driver in the Le Mans 24-Hour race - ahead of Jacky Ickx with six. He recently spoke with Brad Spurgeon of the International Herald Tribune.
snippet: The Danish driver Tom Kristensen, 42, holds the record of eight victories for a driver in the Le Mans 24-Hour race - ahead of Jacky Ickx with six. He recently spoke with Brad Spurgeon of the International Herald Tribune.
